title: Starliner Completes 1st Crewed Docking
summary: Astronauts guide the Boeing spacecraft to orbital connection with the International Space Station A combination of sensors, automatic steering and the careful gaze of two astronauts worked together to make history Thursday, June 6, by guiding Boeing’s CST-100 Starliner to its first docking to the International Space Station (ISS) while carrying astronauts. Crew Flight Test (CFT) Commander […]
